case.state: Don't think I don't know what I'm getting into.
Don't think I don't know what I'm getting into.
I could use ~cards~ cards.
Mind passing ~cards~ over here?
I need a few new cards.
You'll be happy to know, Ruby, that I won't be losing this round.
No worries about me losing this round, Ruby.
You'll be happy to know, Weiss, that I won't be losing this round.
No worries about me losing this round, Weiss.
You'll be sad to know, Yang, that I won't be losing this round.
My apologies, but you won't have to worry about me losing this round, Yang.
That's a sight for sore eyes. Now I won't have to have my team leader think about me in my panties for the moment...
No worries about me losing this round, Ruby. No shame just yet.
That's a sight for sore eyes. Now I won't have to have my teammate think about me in my panties for the moment...
No worries about me losing this round, Weiss. No shame just yet.
That's a sight for sore eyes. Sadly, my teammate won't get to think about me in my panties for the moment...
My apologies, but you won't have to worry about me losing this round, Yang. No shame just yet.
Good, Ruby won't have to see me in my bra and panties this round...
I'm safe for another round.
Good, Weiss won't have to see me in my bra and panties this round...
That all?
Won't have to reveal THAT secret this round...
You know, it's a good thing I have an edge. It's a better thing that my team is the only one who knows about it, at least for the moment.
I'm really glad I get to live another round without showing my team member my breasts, regardless if she may disapprove.
Thankfully, I get to keep my top on this time. I hope you're doing well, Yang.
Woo, that's a good sight... While I'd rather nobody see me naked, I'd really prefer not having my friends seeing that.
No "pussy" jokes yet, Yang. Also, that'd still be rude, no matter the situation.
I don't think I'd be able to look you guys in the eye during practice. Luckily, I get to put that off at least one more time.
Safe for now, Ruby...
I don't think I'd be able to look you guys in the eye during practice. Luckily, I get to put that off at least one more time.
Safe for now, Weiss...
I don't think I'd be able to look you guys in the eye during practice. Luckily, I get to put that off at least one more time.
Safe for now, Yang. Sorry.
This will do just fine.
I feel pretty good with this.
Just what I like to see.
I read a book on this game back in school. This is a good hand.
Lucky me.
I'm good.
I feel like I studied for this, which makes little sense. Still a good hand.
I could go for some tea.
Don't look so dramatic.
Better and better!
I'm all good.
Who says I'm done?
Keep your eyes where they are, I'm good.
That all?
Perfect! I'm safe for another round.
Woo... That's a relief.
Let's just put that worry off for a moment.
This can get worse for me. It won't this round.
And I'm safe. Excellent.
At least I get to keep some of my dignity for the moment.
I suppose this could be worse. I could be any of you, for example.
Looks like I can keep some of my dignity. Pyrrha? You?
If the cards keep this up, I might make it out of here with my dignity.
The best it's going to get!
Can't get much better than that.
That's a sight for sore eyes.
Hopefully I won't have to have my team leader see me in my panties if these are enough...
Hopefully I won't have to have my teammate see me in my panties if these are enough...
Hopefully my teammate won't get to think about me in my panties if these are enough...
I hope I don't end up in my bra and panties in front of Weiss...
I'd prefer to have my team be the only ones know about that, so I hope these work...
This is not how I would have preferred this going... How about you, Weiss?
This is not how I would have preferred this going... How about you, Yang?
I hope I can work with this... Weiss? You alright?
I hope I can work with this... Yang? You alright? Able to live with the fact that I may get to keep my panties this round?
This will have to do. Can't have Weiss see me like that...
This will have to do. Can't have Yang see me like that here...
Not bad.
This ought to be good.
Not the worst in the world.
Oh, that could be better...
Could be worse, could be better.
This looks passable.
This should do.
Good enough.
This will work. If not, I can make it.
I can win with this.
Please be enough.
Wow, a straight flush. How unlikely and unbelievable.
Pull through!
Please work...
I'd prefer to stay dressed, especially considering present company.
C'mon! I can do this!
Need some luck here...
Please let this be enough...
I've survived a semester at Beacon, I can do with this.
I could use a little motivation here.
These will have to do.
This is a good hand.
So, Ruby...
So, Weiss...
Oh, that's not a pleasant sight... Ruby, by chance did you receive a message saying we're needed somewhere?
Oh, that's not a pleasant sight... Weiss, by chance did you receive a message saying we're needed somewhere?
Oh, that's not a pleasant sight... Yang, by chance did you receive a message saying we're needed somewhere?
Well, time to add to the list of "People that know my deepest, darkest secret."
Well, my top's coming off. Sorry, team.
Well. At least Yang will enjoy this next part...
You're welcome, Yang.
Yang, you're going to like this, even if I don't...
That's not promising...
Next time will be better.
It's warm in here anyway.
What an amazing hand.
Not like I'm a perfectionist; I can lose a few. I mean, I'd rather not, but...
I've got stuff to spare. I'm good. Mostly.
I have a pretty good hand.
This looks amazing. A-ma-zing.
I've dealt with worse situations. This is still not great.
I'm pretty happy with my outfit today. How's everyone else feeling about theirs?
I could be reading right now...
This could go poorly.
Gah! I'm starting to regret being here.
It occurs to me that my bra is partially see-through. Damn.
So... Can you keep a secret?
I have a really difficult choice to make...
Seeing as we're all close friends now, I ask that you guys keep quiet about something.
Well. This kind of sucks.
So... Anyone want to trade?
Damnit.
Thank the Brothers...
I-I'm safe...
Just like one of the Mistralian fanfictions I read back at Beacon. With me as the protagonist. Welp.
My hand is pretty alright. That's a lie. I lied and I'm screwed.
Sorry, mom.
Banzai.
I'll just go live in my hole for now.
It still feels weird with Pyrrha being there...
Had to happen sooner or later.
Is this the day you waited for?
If only I kept up that streak.
I'll have you know you're ruining my aesthetic.
At least I'm still ahead...
At least you're all doing worse than me.
About that trump card...
Well. I guess I'm still ahead, if barely...
And we're all in this together.
Black hair isn't exactly rare...
Imposing? Seriously?
A nuance you lack.
If by, "nuanced," you mean, "I can talk to women without assuming things," then yes.
If by, "nuanced," you mean, "I can talk to women without assuming things," then yes.
And? I don't see what some stupid cat guy has to do with anything.
Eh, it works well enough, roboy.
I'm not gloomy...
Well, this is an interesting turn of events, at least.
It's a weird feeling seeing you strip, considering you're like, an actual celebrity.
Piss off, Gunsmoke.
You don't have to be an ass, you know.
I would think you of all people would understand that racism is wrong.
You ass.
You know far too many cat puns to be forgiven.
I guess it’s an ego boost that a champion will see my take my clothes off.
So Yang's going to see my breasts...
Damnit.
And now I'll have to live with the fact that my teammate has seen me naked.
And now I'll have to live with the fact that my teammate has seen me naked.
Want to tell me why you'd assume Faunus look different, Weiss?
And now I'll have to live with the fact that my teammate has seen me strip naked in front of other people.
You got a long way to go.
Karma will be on my side, at least.
But my top is so cute.
If you don't mind, I am a human being. I'd prefer you to not stare.
Tch. This wasn't part of the plan...
I... I really didn't want to do this...
You know, yeah, this is still worse than taking off my bow.
This is a lot worse than taking off my bow... No one's ever...
If you're wondering about all the ribbons, it's to help kill monsters.
All the ribbons have a purpose, I assure you.
Still got plenty. I feel pretty good at the moment.
Confidence is still there. Won't get me that easily.
This is going a bit worse than I expected...
This is what I should have expected coming here...
Ugh, this turned out way worse than I expected...
Don't look if you know what's best for you... Gah!
Well, this is humiliating.
Not all of us WANT to strip...
I can show my gratitude in other ways, like a card on Mother's Day...
For being here or for wimping out?
I'm fine if keeping my clothes on is the most disappointing thing I've done in my life.
It's not like I'm used to this sort of thing!
It's totally acceptable to be a bit nervous!
I'd be a bit more daring if my mother weren't here. Wait, no, probably not actually.
They don't need to know that!
And!?
I don't want to pickup a partner at a place like this!
Now is NOT the time for this, Mom!
That is SO not appropriate to say to your daughter!
Mom!
Yes, I would enjoy not being in your position, Mom...
It's almost like I don't want to be naked in addition to my mom being naked...
Sympathy levels are a bit low...
I'd really rather not have people seen both me and my mom naked...
Considering staying out of the pit means keeping my shirt on...
I'd rather not strip in front of anyone, let alone my mom...
You didn't raise me to strip!
Wait, you're okay with your daughter stripping for people!?
I-I don't have any embarrassing secrets!
WHAT DO YOU KNOW!?
Yeah. I know.
You aren't helping, Mom...
Didn't need help...
Oh, my god, MOM!
I don't dress naughty!
The point of underwear isn't to show it off!
FRIENDS!?
HIS WHAT!?
YOU WEREN'T ALONE!?
You are not touching my boobs, ladybug.
I'll just look over here for a moment and pretend my mom isn't here.
Oh, my god, I'm going to have to get naked in front of my mom...
You sure? You SURE this isn't the worst thing that could happen?
It definitely isn't the best, Mom...
I don't know if it's worse that it's after you stripping, Mom...
Here we are, the Flashing Belladonnas.
No. No, it might just be the worst to have to strip ALONG with your mother...
Yeah. I know.
YES IT IS.
Yes. It is.
DO NOT GET SUN INVOLVED.
SUN DOESN'T NEED TO BE A PART OF THIS.
SUN!?
WHICH ONE!? I MEAN, NO!!!
MOM!
OH MY GOD.
DIDN'T NEED TO HEAR THAT.
A much more elegant weapon, I promise.
What, your weapon doesn't come in gift wrap?
Yes. They make a nice gift wrap.
Don't talk to me about spider-people. Bad memories.
No, but I do know a spider chick.
Wait, magic!?
Well, a weapon is a physical object... Wait, MAGIC!?
There's slip of the tongue and not knowing how to speak to a woman.
Oh, you like my outfit? Thanks...
What, you DON'T carry poker manuals with you?
Sadly, all of my power exists in these boots. I have nothing without them.
What, you think I'm easy?
The ONE day I wear the pair with stockings attached...
I'd appreciate that, Aella.
Tch...

That doesn't give you the right to be an ass, Aimee.
Dammit. Those were actually pretty good puns.
It's marginally better, Pit.
Ugh... I know we’re friends, Pyrrha, but that kind of hurts in this scenario.
This has gone poorly for me...
No, we do not all shave together. That's REALLY weird of you to ask.
This is a bad time for this.
I know you're thinking it, Xiao Long.
So this is a thing that's happening.
I do wish I brought my weapon as proof of why these matter to me. Wait, can weapons count as a forfeit?
At least these boots are easy to take off.
Wait a second...
On second though, this is going in a direction I don't like...
I picked a bad day to not wear leggings.
I'll treat you to lunch if you keep your head about you.
It's just like a bikini. Stop treating it like that.
At least I have a trump card, though I'd really rather not have it come to that...
Promise me you won't tell anyone.
Only a few people know about this! It's not me taking my top off, but it's just as hard, okay!?
Please don't look. It's enough that you saw my ears.
If I hear one "pussy" joke, I will fight you...
Yang! HERE!?
Y-Yang! You wait until now!?
I should hate this but...
MOM! L-let go of me!
Stop holding my arms!
M-mom! Really!?
What are you doing!? Let go!
Hate it.
I'm lying to myself when I say I'll forget this.
MOM!
KEEP WAITING.
They didn't need to know that!
I'm not looking for a partner here of all places!
Pretty sure I hate it.
KEEP WAITING.
MOM!
It's a gun. And... a bit more. It's complicated.
Right, not everybody names their weapons...
It's a gun. Sorry, I just assume most people have one.
Honestly? NOW you make that joke?
As a pet, no doubt.
I can hear you. I read a good amount of manga, thank you.
I wouldn't think a god would be racist.
Leave it to a god to piss me off.
Do you know every human?
I know Kaden as much as you know my third uncle. Don't assume we Faunus know each other.
I want to be pet as much as you want to be shot.
Sexually experience? Just who do you think I am?
Shameless!?
Honey, NEVER care about what a guy tells you.
Believe me, I'm working it. That involves not running out of here at full speed...
You want me to WHAT!?
Mom, now is not the time...
Oh, my god, I didn't need to know that...
I guess I got if from SOMEWHERE...
Mom, please!
I would have gladly gone my life without having my mom tell me to shake my ass.
I don't want them to appreciate the view!
They better not be appreciating the view!
Don't you guys dare take that as an invitation to look at me! Or my mom!
Kitty titties. Happy, Yang?
I'm very hesitant to say that I enjoy ANY part of this with you here.
Small comfort, there, Mom...
I dunno, I feel like an empty room with no strangers staring at me might be a bit better.
DO NOT TELL SUN ABOUT THIS!
SUN DOESN'T NEED TO KNOW ABOUT THIS!
WHY BRING HIM UP? WHY DO THIS TO YOUR DAUGHTER!?
Oh, my god, Mom...
YOU DO THIS FREQUENTLY!?
I did not need to know that...
I'm perfectly fine not being popular if it means I could have kept my bra.
Pussy.
Honey, I look AMAZING in motion.
I rock the lock hair, and don't forget it.
One where we need the big guns.
It's a world where we need something with a little more kick in it.
Not the best world, unfortunately.
Uhh... I mean, I take good care of my gun...
I know better than to let anyone who speaks about guns like that anywhere near a gun.
"Meet," my gun!? It's a tool, not a person.
Even Ruby doesn't treat guns THAT human.
It's kind of a thing to name guns where I'm from...
It's not that weird to name a gun, is it?
If this is your attempt at flirting, I'm not impressed.
I dunno, I might enjoy this game more with a gun in my hand.
I see Pit is wary of our feminine wiles.
Oh, I'm FULLY a ninja, Sola.
Thanks. My character-appropriate panties really make me feel better.
Bellabooty. Happy, Yang?
I mean, I didn't ask if you had stranger friends...
Well, it's good to know that not everyone carries prejudice.
When you say, "Walking flower," how *flower* are we talking?
Much appreciated, Aella.
Glad to know not everyone's the worst...
Some of us have to deal with prejudice. Some more than others.
I suppose I should be happy there are others that are allowed to live normal lives...
It works better than you'd think, to be honest...
Want to explain that, Kira? I can hear you, you know.
Many, many reasons, angel boy.

I'll bring my gun next time.
And yet you aren't the first bitch I've met.
Likewise, you ass.

Sadly it comes with more downsides that upsides.

Well, at least I know I have good boobs...

Extra anatomy!?
Just like the baths.

We haven't gone to the baths since I was young. Now I have breasts for people to stare at.

Yep. Just like the baths. Not at all like anything else.

I hope this doesn’t affect practice.
It's not like it's hard to shave...
Pet and die.

I can hold on a little bit longer without showing my tits...

There. Happy now?

Now I'm standing here without any clothes on. Gah, how did I get here?

So, are these stockings doing it for you?

I should wear crop tops more often.

So how's everyone's day going?
Ugh... Bellabooty. There, I said it. I didn't come up with it.
I would prefer this to not leave this room.
If you don't mind keeping quiet about this...
Ugh...
Of course I wore a thong today...
I know you've been waiting for this view...

Happy?

Try and take a picture and you won't see tomorrow.
Won't be needing this.

Congrats, you made me reveal a deep, personal secret.
Yes, I have cat ears. We're going to leave it at that.
I just didn't want to get pushed around.
I wanted to be known for who I am, not what I am. Got it?

I could have stayed at home. I could have read.
Not AS bad as I imagined...
At least this will make good material for my novel.
